forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, a slight chill drifts through the streets, hinting at the cool night ahead. The sky, partly cloaked in soft clouds, nudges temperatures down towards a gentle 56 degrees, while a steady west-southwest breeze dances between 13 to 21 mph, occasionally teasing with gusts that reach up to 26 mph. For those who wander out tonight, a light jacket or sweater will serve well against the evening's embrace, a reminder of the city's ever-changing temperament.

Come Saturday, the sun will weave its way into the fabric of the day, promising a cheerful warmth that peaks around 67 degrees before retreating into the familiar coolness of the afternoon. With winds fanning out between 9 and 24 mph, the zest of the breeze will bring a refreshing vigor. The day brims with potential—explore the hilly pathways that crisscross Golden Gate Park or opt for a quiet moment in a cafe, savoring a book while the world flits by outside. As the light brightens and clarity reigns supreme, take a moment to appreciate the ephemeral sparkle of this vibrant city, where nature and urbanity coalesce beautifully.
